name: Brave Little Mouse
description:
A 2D platformer with the theme "poisonous". Players must control the mouse through the Citysearch in search of cheese.  Avoid dangers like dumpsters, cats, and rat poison. Players must wall climb and time their jumps carefully  to keep the mouse out of harms way. 

Credits

Background:  Cyberpunk Street Environment by ANSIMUZ; Unity asset store

Cheese: Free Pixel Food, Henry Software; Unity Asset Store

Music: "Dark Alley" Doug Maxwell, Jimmy Fontanez; YouTube Audio Library

Mechanics: code created by Michael Baker - University of Texas at Austin

Original art created with Pixilart.com by me
